page.title: 12LANDSCAPE AND BUILDING (2)
page.content: On Tuesday, most of the shops close at lunchtime for the rest of the day, and on Wednesday and Saturday the open air market is held near the canal.The small town is full of friendly people and any news concerning the people or the events that have taken place are recorded in The Brighouse Echo, the town's local weekly newspaper. Brighouse is well known both nationally and internationally for it's local brass band "The Brighouse and Rastrick Band" which is funded by public subscription and has been in existence for over 100 years.
